content.title: 最高裁はマイキー・アロヨの税金訴訟を断罪すると断言 -  INQUIRER.net
content.desc: The Supreme Court has affirmed the dismissal of the tax evasion case of former party-list Rep. Juan Miguel "Mikey" Arroyo.

content.title: OSGの失効のため、SCはマイキー・アロヨの税金訴訟での無罪判決を支持する - ラップラー
content.desc: The appeal is junked because the Office of the Solicitor General committed procedural lapses.

content.title: SCは27M脱税事件でマイキー・アロヨを無罪で棄権 -  CNNフィリピン
content.desc: Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, December 5) — The Supreme Court (SC) has affirmed the acquittal of former Pampanga 2nd District Representative Juan Miguel "Mikey" Arroyo in his P27-million tax evasion case. In an extended resolution dated September 12, 2018, the high court said it junked the government's appeal assailing the Court of Tax Appeals' (CTA) decision to clear Arroyo "for its procedural defects and substantive deficiencies." SC upholds Arroyo "The CTA in Division, noting that the BIR (Bureau of Internal Revenue) did not discover the sources of Arroyo's vaunted income, fully disclos...

content.title: 公務員はPorac居住者に教育援助を配布する -  SunStar Philippines
content.source_nm: サンスターフィリピン
content.desc: PAMPANGA. Former 2nd District congressman Mikey Arroyo and Porac mayoralty candidate Vice-Mayor Dexter Albert David and Team Dad led the recent distribution of educational assistance under the Ched Tulong Dunong Program at the Porac Gym. (Chris Navarro)
